meanings.sent1: I stubbed my hallux on the table leg.

meanings.definition: The innermost digit of the hind foot of vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The hallux of the cat helps it climb trees with ease.
meanings.sent2: Birds use their hallux to grip onto branches securely.
meanings.sent3: The hallux of the frog looked like a tiny suction cup.
meanings.sent4: The hallux of the gecko seemed to defy gravity as it clung to the wall.
meanings.sent5: The hallux of the chimpanzee is opposable, allowing it to grasp objects effectively.
